name: Sandra Sturgess
quote: The group environment is great for connecting with like-minded professionals. Brenda has a great way about her. When she speaks to the group, you feel like she is connecting with you one-on-one. Specific examples are used to provide concrete take-aways. I recommend joining Brenda's seminars (Women In Action Leadership Series) if you are looking for thought-provoking discussion, excellent educational information, and great company!

name: WIALS Participant
quote: Great content and discussions amongst a lovely group of motivated and like-minded women! With Brenda's leadership experience and guidance, I completed this course feeling supported and empowered.

name: WIALS Participant
quote: I wish I'd found this series earlier! Totally recommend it to any woman looking to smash her goals. It's been a total game-changer for me.

name: WIALS Participant
quote: This course has been truly transformative, providing valuable tools and insights for personal and professional growth. Under Brenda's passionate leadership, each session was engaging and empowering. I highly recommend this course to any woman seeking to expand her horizons and make a meaningful impact in her career.
